comment: I would study for tests for hours and I would barely pass the tests. Everything is lockdown/webcam, tests and quizzes. Tests and quizzes are the same week, the quiz is after the test which is a little weird. SO MUCH HOMEWORK. I went to every class and she just reads off the slides. Try to find another prof before taking this one.

Can be hard lectures are very long and boring The hw is easy and if you do it all you get bonus points. She says attendance isn't mandatory but that's not true she always says stuff in class and doesn't post it anywhere and those things are on the test which are webcam and lockdown For reference I went to class and studied her tests are hard.

I am a very lazy student and I often do the bare minimum. This prof makes it very easy to pass. Her lectures contain basically everything that will be on the test. The textbook is a little pricey and that is where the hw is, but there is a free trial that last 2 weeks and she'll reopen all the hw on the last two weeks of class. 10/10 class!
I never went to class, just did my Pearson homework (super easy) and the test that were lockdown no camera, and got an A.
